column2: The strong tradition of archery produces excellent bowmen. Here they can practise with their powerful longbows.
The strong tradition of archery in England and Wales produces excellent bowmen. Here they can practise with their powerful longbows.
The hardy peoples of the mountains are experts at fighting in rough and rocky terrain.
The hardy peoples of the Himalayas are experts at fighting in rough and mountainous terrain.
This light cavalry force can trace its origins back centuries. Armed with spears and shields, they often serve in a support role, charging the enemy as soon as an opportunity presents itself.
This light cavalry force can trace its origins back to Serbia. Armed with spears and shields, they often serve in a support role, charging the enemy as soon as an opportunity presents itself.
These urban militias are named after the mace they favor in battle. They have proven themselves more than once against armored cavalry.
These urban militias are named after the Flemish goedendag mace they favor in battle. They have proven themselves more than once against armored cavalry.
Has not been approached by the Cold Ones before.
Has not been approached by the Cult of Kali before.
Has not been approached by your Society before\n

Those who serve [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] hide in our midst, dedicating their depravities and perfidies to nefarious gods and spirits. Every transgression is a hymn, every murder a roar of defiance against the word of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Such dark sacraments are rewarded handsomely â€“ cultists are said to be gifted with unnatural lifespans and all manner of otherworldly powers.
Has not been approached by the Plaguebringers before.
Has not been approached by Lucifer's Own before\n
Has not been approached by the Fellowship of Hel before.
This [GetGirlWomanBoyMan] belongs to the Brahmin caste. It is the Indian caste of priests and scholars, highest in the caste hierarchy.
This [GetGirlWomanBoyMan] belongs to the Brahmin caste. It is the [hindu.GetName] caste of priests and scholars, highest in the caste hierarchy.
This [GetGirlWomanBoyMan] belongs to the Kshatriya caste. It is the Indian caste of warriors and kings, second in the caste hierarchy.
This [GetGirlWomanBoyMan] belongs to the Kshatriya caste. It is the [hindu.GetName] caste of warriors and kings, second in the caste hierarchy.
This [GetGirlWomanBoyMan] belongs to the Vaishya caste. It is the Indian caste of traders and artisans, third in the caste hierarchy.
